Probabilities of 10% correction: 
 
Since 1928 SPX was 3X more likely to suffer 10% decline at some point w/in next 3 months if SPX A/D Line was NOT at multi-year high 
 
When it did break out to new high, there was ONLY 4.6% probability of 10% or > decline w/in next few months

links.title: Despite supply issues and omicron, holiday sales rise 8.5%
links.description: Holiday sales rose at the fastest pace in 17 years, even as shoppers grappled with higher prices, product shortages and a raging new Covid-19 variant in the last few weeks of the season, according to one spending measure.

links.title: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL), Facebook, Inc. (NASDAQ:FB) - Apple Hires Away Meta's Key Augmented Reality Employee, Ramping Up Efforts For AR Headset Release: Report
links.description: A new report indicates that Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) has hired away a key employee from Meta Platforms Inc (NASDAQ: FB) ahead of the anticipated release of an Augmented Reality (AR) headset by the iPhone maker.
